name: Procurement Pending
query:
SELECT
  `tabMaterial Request`.name AS `Request ID`,
  `tabMaterial Request`.owner AS `Request By`,
  `tabMaterial Request Item`.modified AS `Request Date`,
  `tabMaterial Request Item`.item_name,
  `tabMaterial Request Item`.brand,
  `tabMaterial Request Item`.qty,
  `tabMaterial Request Item`.uom,
  `tabMaterial Request`.status
FROM `tabMaterial Request`
  INNER JOIN `tabMaterial Request Item`
    ON `tabMaterial Request`.name = `tabMaterial Request Item`.parent
WHERE `tabMaterial Request`.docstatus = 1
AND `tabMaterial Request`.material_request_type = 'Purchase'

AND `tabMaterial Request`.status = %(status)s
ORDER BY `Request Date`
